content: hat attach by sewing each hat stitch to a remaining flo of the first line you will be working over the beard at the front of the gnome stuff hat firmly as you go first line attach here designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photo enjoy your new gnome glasses holder if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
